page.title: 13Shopping in Barnt Green
page.content: We found that most people went once a week to do most of their shopping and that they went to Redditch, Northfield, Bromsgrove and to the village supermarket in Barnt Green. Milk was delivered each morning to over 90% of the population. Fresh produce was bought locally but luxury goods such as clothes, shoes and electrical appliances were purchased from towns nearby. The village garage stopped selling petrol and so everyone has to buy petrol from places such as Rednal or Lickey. The local shops do a large amount of trade and compete well with shops in the nearby towns. The local people were very satisfied with the quality and quantity of the local shops.
